title: Jackknife Bar
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An upscale lounge/bar located (but with separate entry/exit) within the Sentinel Hotel in downtown. Several styles of seating are available from bar seats, dining tables with chairs to cozy, romantic couches by a 2-sided fireplace, and picnic tables outdoors. The menu is 90% vegan and does have gluten-free options. The prices are average, and not high priced though the atmosphere is classy. Parking is in a public garage one block away, plus a mass transit train (MAX) is also within a block.
